div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1858 Butkhak, c. 20 km. S of Cabul (anc. Cabura, Paropamisadae), before 1943 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: c. 200 AR. In a stone jar Hermaeus: tetradr. (and dr.?) Disposition: Sotheby, April 30, 1958 (Haughton), no. 489 Haughton, NC 1943, pp. 54, 59
